newsitem.title: USA: Canadian spot natgas extends losses on NYMEX.
newsitem.headline: Canadian spot natgas extends losses on NYMEX.

text.p: Canadian spot natgas prices moved lower again Friday as Henry Hub gas futures continued their downward spiral, industry sources said.
Spot gas at the AECO storage hub in Alberta was quoted at C$1.72-1.77 per gigajoule (GJ), down an average of eight cents from Thursday.
NYMEX's Henry Hub June contract fell to a low of $2.195 in Friday's session, down another 7.8 cents.
Sumas export pricing followed suit by drifting three cents lower to the mid-$1.40s per million British thermal units (mmBtu), traders said.
